item.title: 日本企业对中国经济越来越悲观
item.description: 在华日资企业对中国这个世界第二大经济体的看法越来越悲观，约三分之二的企业认为中国经济正在恶化，近一半的企业缩减或停止了投资。【原文：Japanese firms in China are becoming more pessimistic about the world’s second-biggest economy, with about two-thirds saying it’s getting worse and almost half scaling back or halting their investments.】

item.title: 历史对美国未来的警示
item.description:
在本周的《投票经济学》（Voternomics）节目中，作者彼得-图尔钦（Peter Turchin）解释了为什么唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的回归并不令人意外，以及它所代表的意义。【原文：

On this week’s Voternomics, author Peter Turchin explains why Donald Trump’s return isn’t a surprise, and what it represents. 

】

item.title: 预测市场赢了，对吗？仅限于一点
item.description:
他们不应该在特朗普上台后获得如此多的余晖。民调结果比他们的功劳更大。【原文：

They don’t deserve quite this much post-Trump afterglow. And polls did better than they’re credited.

】

item.title: 保诚在中国市场的低迷为股价反弹埋下伏笔
item.description: 由于担心保险公司在中国的风险，保诚集团（Prudential Plc）的股价今年以来一路下跌，根据分析师的平均目标股价计算，保诚集团是富时 100 指数中隐含上涨空间最大的股票。【原文：Prudential Plc shares have fallen so far this year amid worries over the insurer’s China exposure that they now offer the most implied upside of any stock in the FTSE 100 index, based on average analyst price targets.】

item.title: 航空公司出走使以色列人及其公司孤立无援
item.description: 以色列对哈马斯的战争引发了对其作者的抵制，切断了与哈马斯科学家的合作，并可能对其官员发出逮捕令。但是，没有什么比来往以色列的航班大幅减少更让以色列人感到孤立无援了。【原文：Israel’s war against Hamas has sparked boycotts against its authors, cut cooperation with its scientists and raised possible arrest warrants against its officials. But nothing has made Israelis feel more isolated than the massive drop-off in flights to and from the country.】

item.title: 无人机制造商 Tekever 从 SpaceX 的支持者北约融资 7000 万欧元
item.description: 无人机制造商 Tekever 已获得 7000 万欧元（7400 万美元）融资，该公司表示将利用这笔资金拓展新市场，开发更大、更快的无人机系统。【原文：Drone maker Tekever has raised €70 million ($74 million) in funding, which the company says it will use to expand into new markets and develop bigger, faster unmanned aerial systems.】

item.title: 中国从美国进口液化天然气数量激增，下一场贸易战将对其构成威胁
item.description: 美国今年加大了对华液化天然气的销售力度，但如果即将上任的特朗普政府与中国政府在贸易问题上发生冲突，这种激增的势头可能不会持久。【原文：The US has boosted sales of liquefied natural gas to China this year, although the surge may not last if the incoming Trump administration collides with Beijing over trade.】

item.title: 欧洲央行和日本央行货币政策背离，欧元兑日元成为关注焦点
item.description: 欧元-日元正受到越来越多的关注，因为这两个地区的政策分歧似乎将为该货币对提供机会。【原文：Euro-yen is getting increased attention as policy divergence between the two regions looks set to offer opportunities in the currency pair.】

item.title: 橡树树的马克斯称 "无法投资 "的中国可提供物美价廉的资产
item.description: 橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management LP）联席董事长兼联合创始人霍华德-马克斯（Howard Marks）表示，即使其他投资者避开中国这个世界第二大经济体，橡树资本管理公司仍在中国寻找便宜货。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management LP is looking for bargains in China even as other investors shun the world’s second-biggest economy, according to co-chairman and co-founder Howard Marks.】

item.title: 英伟达合作伙伴鸿海在人工智能热潮中获得 11 亿美元银行贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，台湾鸿海精密工业股份有限公司（Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.【原文：Taiwan’s Hon Hai Precision Industry Co. has raised $1.1 billion via a three-year loan, according to people familiar with the matter, as the iPhone maker continues to ride on a boom in AI server demand.】

item.title: 阿联酋 1 万亿美元的市场主要由王室主导
item.description: 自大流行病爆发以来，阿拉伯联合酋长国上市股票的市值一路飙升，突破了 1 万亿美元。然而，在大幅攀升的背后，投资者面对的是一个由统治者严重主导的复杂市场。【原文：A surge in the years since the pandemic has propelled stocks listed in the United Arab Emirates past $1 trillion in market value. Yet behind the dramatic ascent, investors face a complex market heavily dominated by its rulers.】

item.title: 企业动荡照亮东京证券交易所，股市下跌一天
item.description: 周三，交易商和激进投资者为日本股市注入了新的活力，引发 Seven & i Holdings Co.、东京燃气公司（Tokyo Gas Co.）和小林制药株式会社（Kobayashi Pharmaceutical Co.【原文：Deal makers and activist investors injected drama into the Japanese equity market on Wednesday, triggering sharp rallies in shares of Seven & i Holdings Co., Tokyo Gas Co. and Kobayashi Pharmaceutical Co.】

item.title: 香港监管机构发出警告后 Sprocomm 股价暴跌 91
item.description: Sprocomm Intelligence Ltd.是一家鲜为人知的移动电话和电子产品制造商，在监管机构对该公司严格的股权结构发出警告后，其股价在香港暴跌。【原文：Shares of Sprocomm Intelligence Ltd., a little-known mobile phone and electronics maker, crashed in Hong Kong after a regulatory warning about the firm’s tightly-owned share structure.】

item.title: 中国政府推动改革提振股市，中国基金削减费用
item.description: 中国的共同基金公司正在削减交易所交易基金产品的费用，因为它们响应当局的号召，支持中国 10 万亿美元的股票市场。【原文：Chinese mutual fund houses are cutting fees on their exchange-traded fund products, as they heeded authorities’ call to support the nation’s $10 trillion stock market.】

item.title: 阿达尼公司在之前的交易被推迟后再次发行美元债券
item.description: 亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的企业集团周三启动了美元债券销售，上个月由于一些投资者对定价提出异议而推迟了发行。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani’s conglomerate kicked off a dollar bond sale on Wednesday after postponing an offering last month when some investors pushed back on pricing.】

item.title: 据说太阳能材料供应商青海利浩准备在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国太阳能材料供应商青海力昊半导体材料股份有限公司正在考虑最早于2025年下半年在香港首次公开募股。【原文：Chinese solar-energy materials supplier Qinghai Lihao Semiconductor Material Co. is considering a Hong Kong initial public offering as early as the second half of 2025, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贸易逆风加剧，IMF 下调韩国经济增长预期
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）下调了对韩国经济增长的预期，指出这个依赖出口的国家面临着日益严重的不利因素，这也回应了经济学家们日益增长的担忧。【原文：The International Monetary Fund lowered its forecast for South Korea’s economic growth, pointing to rising headwinds facing the export-reliant nation and echoing growing concerns among economists.】

item.title: S&P警告在预算争夺战中可能下调芝加哥信用评级
item.description: 据 S&P 全球评级公司的分析师称，芝加哥的信用评级受到威胁，因为该市正在考虑使用一次性预算平衡措施来弥补巨大的资金缺口。【原文：Chicago’s credit rating is threatened as the city mulls using one-time budget-balancing measures to close a gaping shortfall, according to analysts from S&P Global Ratings.】

item.title: 中国银行上月大幅下调贷款利率后保持稳定
item.description: 继上月大幅下调基准贷款利率后，中国各银行继续维持基准利率不变。【原文：Chinese banks held their benchmark lending rates following a major cut last month.】

item.title: 中国的 "太空帆船 "将在巴西挑战埃隆-马斯克的 "星链 "计划
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在卫星互联网业务方面的中国竞争对手计划于 2026 年在巴西开始运营，这家总部位于上海的公司负责人周二告诉彭博新闻社。【原文：Elon Musk’s Chinese rival in the satellite internet business plans to start operations in Brazil in 2026, the head of the Shanghai-based company told Bloomberg News Tuesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚预算收入增幅较小，企业税减少
item.description: 澳大利亚财政部长吉姆-查默斯（Jim Chalmers）表示，随着主要贸易伙伴中国经济降温和本地就业市场放缓，澳大利亚面临着更具挑战性的财政前景，这表明税收收入的提升幅度将小于往年。【原文：Australia faces a more challenging fiscal outlook as key trading partner China cools and the local job market loosens, suggesting tax revenue upgrades will be smaller than in previous years, Treasurer Jim Chalmers said.】

item.title: 伊藤家族寻求在 2024 年底前完成交易，7-Eleven 所有者业绩大增
item.description: 日本 NHK 广播公司报道称，零售巨头 Seven & i 控股公司的创始家族正寻求在今年年底前完成将公司私有化的交易，该公司股价在东京早盘交易中一度跳涨达 10%。【原文：Shares of Seven & i Holdings Co. jumped as much as 10% in early Tokyo trading after Japanese broadcaster NHK reported the founding family of the retail giant is looking to complete a deal to take the company private by the end of this year.】

item.title: 俄罗斯核转变激发避风港需求，黄金保持涨势
item.description: 随着俄罗斯对乌克兰战争的紧张局势升级，避险资产需求上升，黄金连续两天攀升。【原文：Gold held a two-day climb, with rising demand for haven assets following an escalation of tensions in Russia’s war against Ukraine.】

item.title: 中国移动讨论收购互联网服务提供商 HKBN 的潜在交易
item.description: 全球用户数量最多的无线运营商中国移动正在洽谈收购香港宽带服务提供商香港宽带有限公司（HKBN Ltd. ）的可能性，以扩大其在香港的业务范围。【原文：China Mobile, the world’s largest wireless carrier by subscribers, is in talks on a potential acquisition of Hong Kong broadband provider HKBN Ltd. as it looks to expand its footprint in the city.】

item.title: 艾略特股权报告发布后，东京燃气股价创 1987 年以来最大涨幅
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）宣布收购了东京燃气公司 5.03% 的股份后，该公司股价在周三早盘交易中一度上涨 15%，创下自 1987 年以来的最大涨幅。【原文：Tokyo Gas Co.’s stock rose 15% at one point in early trading Wednesday, its biggest climb since 1987, after Elliott Investment Management reported it had acquired 5.03% of the utility company’s shares.】

item.title: 报告称英国官方统计少算了 100 万个工作岗位
item.description: 一份新的报告显示，英国低估了近 100 万就业人口的数量，该报告进一步怀疑了对英格兰银行至关重要的官方估计。【原文：Britain has underestimated the number of people in employment by almost 1 million, according to a new report that casts further doubt on official estimates that are crucial for the Bank of England.】

item.title: 美元反弹遭遇 "波涛汹涌"，双向交易回归
item.description: 一些关键的市场指标开始表明，随着美国大选引发的看涨情绪减弱，特朗普激发的美元涨势可能已经趋于平稳。【原文：Some key market metrics are starting to suggest the Trump-inspired rally in the dollar may have plateaued, as bullishness fueled by the US election wanes.】

item.title: 日本出口在全球风险中增长，支持经济复苏
item.description: 日本 10 月份的出口增长超过预期，因为即使在主要海外市场不确定性增加的情况下，全球需求仍基本保持坚挺。【原文：Japan’s exports picked up more than expected in October as global demand held more or less firm even in the face of mounting uncertainties in key overseas markets.】

item.title: 医院业主 MPT 接管前景医疗实体
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社查阅的一封信函副本，美国最大的医院业主之一医疗地产信托公司（Medical Properties Trust Inc.【原文：Medical Properties Trust Inc., one of the largest hospital landlords in the US, has moved to take control of three Southern California health care entities after accusing the owner — Prospect Medical Holdings — of defaulting on debt, according to a copy of a letter reviewed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 行业报告指出美国库存增加，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 由于一份行业报告显示，在政府官方数据公布之前，美国原油库存有所增加，石油价格持稳。【原文：Oil was steady as an industry report signaled a build in US crude inventories ahead of official government figures.】
